name: Nanolaminate Armor
desc: A special metal paint that reacts to Ahab Particles is vapor-deposited onto the surface of the armor of Mobile Suits and ships. Reduce Energy effect by %s.

name: Alaya-Vijnana System
desc: The Alaya-Vijnana System creates a pseudo-brain lobe in the pilot's body using nano-machines, and this allows the pilot's brain to directly process mobile suit data fed through the physical connection. As the pseudo-brain lobe also governs spatial awareness so the pilot's spatial awareness is enhanced. Increasing maneuverability by %s.
